short_summary: Replacement dock equipment and recreational watercraft
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 26, 2024 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide a floating dock as described in Annex - Statement of requirement to Parks Canada Agency. This requirement includes an option to purchase up to two (2) additional docks within the next two (2) years after the initial contract term from 1 May , 2025 to 30 April , 2027.
duration_in_months: You must confirm options in your proposal
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Floating Dock
## RFP- 5P334-230207 (WS4412901107)
### **Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of a floating dock for the Parks Canada Agency (PC). The successful offeror will be awarded a contract to provide, deliver, and maintain a floating dock as per the statement of requirement, attached as Annex to this notice.

### **Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding (Méthode d'approvisionnement : Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)**

The procurement is being conducted through an open bidding process, allowing interested offerors to submit their proposals. The award of the contract will be based on the lowest price, as per the selection criteria.

### **Trade Agreements: Applicable Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### **Eligible Regions: Ontario (except NCR)**

The successful offeror must be able to provide and deliver the floating dock in Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

### **Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### **End User Entity: Parks Canada Agency (PC)**

The end user of the floating dock will be the Parks Canada Agency (PC).

### **Important Submission Guidelines**

The bid submission deadline has been amended to March 26, 2024, at 14:00 EDT. Late submissions will not be accepted.

## Notice Information

* Publication Date: 2024-02-12
* Amendment Date: 2024-03-07
* Solic
